basic.description: This course assumes previous field experiences and focuses on issues in curriculum, assessment, and the use of technology in science instruction. The course is offered at the school site, is project-based, and there is an extensive fieldwork component.
basic.subject: SCE
basic.title: Advanced Topics in High School Science Teaching and Learning

extra.enrollment_requirement: Pre- or corequisites: SCE 4320 and SCE 4362.
